StudentProfile.title: Student Profile
StudentProfile.description: Represents a student user's profile information.

name.description: The full name of the student.

email.description: The student's email address, used for login.

class.description: The class or grade the student is in.

overallProgress.description: The student's overall course progress percentage.

lastActive.description: The last time the student was active.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the student's avatar image.

avatarHint.description: AI hint for the avatar image.

/students/{studentId}.description: Stores profile information for each student user. The document ID is the student's auth UID.
